content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for expressing interest in my apartment. Based on your inquiry, I would like to propose a rental price of €800 per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Munich. Is this a price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros. I will sign the contract and pay the security deposit.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Excellent, Bo Li. I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of €800 per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the contract. Once we have finalized the details, I will arrange for you to pay the security deposit.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to ask if there is any possibility of a lower rental price.

I understand that this apartment is located in a prime location and the size is only 25 square meters, but I would like to know if there is any possibility of a lower rental price. I am a student and I am on a tight budget, so any discount would be greatly appreciated.

Can you please let me know if there is any possibility of a lower rental price?

Thank you.

Best regards,

Bo Li

China
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Dear Bo Li,

Thank you for your inquiry. I understand that you are a student and are looking for a more affordable rental option. Unfortunately, the location and size of the apartment are factors that contribute to the higher rental price. However, I am willing to consider a lower rental price if you are able to provide a longer lease term.

If you are willing to sign a lease of one year or more, I may be able to offer a lower rental price. Please let me know if this is a possibility that you are interested in pursuing.

Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
